title: 85/238/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 April 1985 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1985 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 15 April 1985
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1985 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(85/238/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy submitted by the Italian Government for 1985 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 April 1985.
For the Commission
Alois PFEIFFER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 195, 18. 7. 1981, p. 48.
